definitions.definition: one of several thin, sharp points that stick out of a plant or animal:
examples: The fruit can be eaten once the prickles have been removed.

definitions.definition: a feeling as if a lot of little points are sticking into your body:
examples: I felt a hot prickle of embarrassment spread across my cheeks.

definitions.definition: If thin, sharp objects prickle you, they cause slight pain by touching against your skin:
examples: She lay on the grass and the stiff dry grass prickled the back of her legs.

definitions.definition: If part of your body prickles, it feels as if a lot of sharp points are touching it because you are frightened or excited:
examples: Turner started to be worried and felt the back of his neck prickle.
